Docs.summary: The namespace contains the class, which provides support for strongly typed resources. Beginning with .NET Framework version 2.0, this compile-time feature encapsulates access to resources by creating classes that contain a set of static read-only () properties, thus making it easier to consume resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information about strongly typed resources, see <xref:System.Resources.Tools.StronglyTypedResourceBuilder>.
